# What do incoming university students believe about open science practices in psychology?

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This project explores incoming students' knowledge about, and attitudes toward,
open science practices. This project is led by Michael Philipp, Matthew Williams, 
and Jennifer Beaudry. 

OSF page for this project: https://osf.io/gmsbn/
